app.name: WiiSXR
app.long_description:
Wii64 Team is: WIISXR/CUBESXR fork by Mystro256
General Coder - emu_kidid Graphics & Menu Coder - sepp256 Audio & Core Coder - tehpola
WiiSX is a port of PCSX to the Wii
Special Thanks to: drmr - Graphics shagkur/WinterMute - libogc/devkitPPC Team Twiizers for Wii homebrew matguitarist - USB 2.0 Support Daxtsu - LIBWUPC support iiiGerardoiii - WIISXR logo
